title: Eye (SLASH'EM)
data:
[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces a number of monsters similar to the [Floating eye](/wiki/Floating_eye "Floating eye"). Unlike the floating eye, the new monsters possess offensive [gaze attacks](/wiki/Gaze_attack "Gaze attack") and will use them on you whenever they get a chance. All are also mindless, making it more difficult to approach them after [blinding yourself](/wiki/Blindfold "Blindfold") to avoid their gaze.

See also [The Beholder](/wiki/Beholder_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Beholder (SLASH'EM)").

## Glowing eye

| e glowing eye [![Glowing eye.png](/images/c/c0/Glowing_eye.png)](/wiki/File:Glowing_eye.png) |                                       |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                              | 7                                     |
| **Attacks**                                                                                  | Gaze 3d4 [blind](/wiki/Blind "Blind") |
|                                                                                              |                                       |

| e glowing eye [![Glowing eye.png](/images/c/c0/Glowing_eye.png)](/wiki/File:Glowing_eye.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 7                                                                                                              |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Gaze 3d4 [blind](/wiki/Blind "Blind")                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 5                                                                                                              |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 59                                                                                                             |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 3                                                                                                              |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 4                                                                                                              |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 0                                                                                                              |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 0 (neutral)                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 1 (Very rare)                                                                                                  |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Yes                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 10                                                                                                             |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | 10                                                                                                             |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Small                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | None                                                                                                           |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | None                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| A glowing eye:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line561](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line561 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The gaze attack of the **Glowing eye** is identical in effect to that of the [Archon](/wiki/Archon "Archon"). The gaze will cause blinding for 3d4 turns and stun for 1d3 turns if not wearing [The Eyes of the Overworld](/wiki/The_Eyes_of_the_Overworld "The Eyes of the Overworld").

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | None                                                                                                           |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                |
| A bloodshot eye:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line589](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line589 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The gaze attack of the **Bloodshot eye** is identical to [Baalzebub](/wiki/Baalzebub "Baalzebub")'s gaze attack. Eating its corpse will cause [hallucination](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination").

## Blinking eye

| e blinking eye [![Blinking eye.png](/images/7/77/Blinking_eye.png)](/wiki/File:Blinking_eye.png) |                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------ |

|                                                                                                  |                                            |

| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 1 (Very rare)                                                                                                  |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Yes                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 10                                                                                                             |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 10                                                                                                             |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Small                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | None                                                                                                           |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | causes [teleportitis](/wiki/Teleportitis "Teleportitis") (80%)                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                |
| A blinking eye:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* can [teleport](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line596](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line596 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The gaze attack of the **Blinking eye** is identical to the attack of the [Quantum mechanic](/wiki/Quantum_mechanic "Quantum mechanic"). It has the same speed as a player without speed and will cause you to teleport on every turn that it is able to lock gazes, making it extremely annoying to approach without either a blindfold/towel or [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control"). However, if you have teleport control, during an intense battle you can save it for last, and use it for the free teleportation. Eating the corpse of a blinking eye has a very large chance of conveying teleportitis.
html:
Eye (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

SLASH'EM introduces a number of monsters similar to the Floating eye. Unlike the floating eye, the new monsters possess offensive gaze attacks and will use them on you whenever they get a chance. All are also mindless, making it more difficult to approach them after blinding yourself to avoid their gaze.

See also The Beholder.

Glowing eye

e glowing eye
Difficulty 7
Attacks Gaze 3d4 blind
e glowing eye
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Gaze 3d4 blind

Base level 5
Base experience 59
Speed 3
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A glowing eye:

  • can fly.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line561

The gaze attack of the Glowing eye is identical in effect to that of the Archon. The gaze will cause blinding for 3d4 turns and stun for 1d3 turns if not wearing The Eyes of the Overworld.

Bloodshot eye

e bloodshot eye
Difficulty 8
Attacks Gaze 3d4 stun
e bloodshot eye
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Gaze 3d4 stun

Base level 6
Base experience 76
Speed 3
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A bloodshot eye:

  • can fly.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line589

The gaze attack of the Bloodshot eye is identical to Baalzebub's gaze attack. Eating its corpse will cause hallucination.

Blinking eye

e blinking eye
Difficulty 10
Attacks Gaze teleport
e blinking eye
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Gaze teleport

Base level 8
Base experience 116
Speed 12
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed causes teleportitis (80%)

A blinking eye:

  • can fly.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • can teleport.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line596

The gaze attack of the Blinking eye is identical to the attack of the Quantum mechanic. It has the same speed as a player without speed and will cause you to teleport on every turn that it is able to lock gazes, making it extremely annoying to approach without either a blindfold/towel or teleport control. However, if you have teleport control, during an intense battle you can save it for last, and use it for the free teleportation. Eating the corpse of a blinking eye has a very large chance of conveying teleportitis.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Eye_(SLASH%27EM)&oldid=98306"

rawPage:
[[SLASH'EM]] introduces a number of monsters similar to the [[Floating eye]]. Unlike the floating eye, the new monsters possess offensive [[Gaze attack|gaze attacks]] and will use them on you whenever they get a chance. All are also mindless, making it more difficult to approach them after [[blindfold|blinding yourself]] to avoid their gaze.

See also [[Beholder (SLASH'EM)|The Beholder]].

== Glowing eye ==
{{ monster
 |name=glowing eye
 |difficulty=7
 |level=5
 |experience=59
 |speed=3
 |AC=4

 |resistances conveyed=None

 |size=Small
 |nutr=10
 |weight=10
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line561]]
}}
The gaze attack of the '''Glowing eye''' is identical in effect to that of the [[Archon]]. The gaze will cause blinding for 3d4 turns and stun for 1d3 turns if not wearing [[The Eyes of the Overworld]].

The gaze attack of the '''Blinking eye''' is identical to the attack of the [[Quantum mechanic]]. It has the same speed as a player without speed and will cause you to teleport on every turn that it is able to lock gazes, making it extremely annoying to approach without either a blindfold/towel or [[teleport control]]. However, if you have teleport control, during an intense battle you can save it for last, and use it for the free teleportation. Eating the corpse of a blinking eye has a very large chance of conveying teleportitis.
